verbs.description: [ARG1: i] [V: ’m] [ARG2: an ‘ elder’ not a ‘ mister’ — pdp deputy national chairman throws tantrum on national tv when it was akinwonmi turn to speak he first took] out a few seconds to protest his introduction as a mister i am elder yemi akinwonmi i ’m not a mister he said his face contouring into a frown before going on to add national chairman africa coalition of united political parties all progressives congress cupp muhammadu buhari deputy national chairman elder yemi akinwonmi sahara reporters pdp peoples democratic party segun oshinaga independent national electoral commission abduljalil tafawa balewa
